originalText.text:
Advantage Cleaning took our venue after being dark for to years back to life. They are reliable, great with even last minute request. Omar answers my text anytime day or night. His team is solid and very professional. They have a team for anything and everything you need, cleaning, painting, etc..... one stop shop for SURE!
Elizabeth From City Experiences by Hornblower Cruises

originalText.text: We had such an excellent experience with Advantage Cleaning. They provided us with high-quality, professional, and affordable cleaning services. Dealing with Omar and Anna was seamless, and they were so accommodating to our needs. They were quick to respond to my texts and phone calls, which was very helpful in this situation. Their workers were polite, respectful, and professional. They arrived on-time with their own equipment and navigated the areas beautifully. Our appliances and rooms were cleaned thoroughly and left a pleasant smell when the work was complete. We are so happy that we chose them and we highly recommend them to others looking for cleaning services. Thank you so much Omar, Anna, Cecilia and everyone else on the team!

originalText.text: We were in need of good pricing and and top notch work when this pandemic hit . We were advised  by a friend to call Omar at advantage cleaning. He came to our warehouse looked around thoroughly to see what are options were . Bottom line If you want a company with professionalism, integrity and most of reliable then Advantage cleaning is your best bet . They did such a solid job In making sure our staff was safe and are facility was sanitized . Thank you Omar and employees at advantage cleaning you def have our vote .

originalText.text: I cannot recommend Advantage Cleaning highly enough to anyone in the NYC area!  We've used their services for deep cleaning each time we reopened after the many COVID related temporary closures.  They've been beyond accommodating with our ever changing schedule, did an absolutely stellar job from top to bottom, and were an absolute pleasure to work with! Thank you Advantage Cleaning!!!

originalText.text: After many cleaning services, Advantage is the one we are finally happy with. Professional managers and responsible cleaners. They were pricier than we were used to which required a leap of faith, but I am happy with the decision in the end. They’re worth it.
